articles.author: Jack Cozens
articles.title: Winners and losers from Le Mans's record 2024 Hypercar fight - The Race
articles.description: Who came up trumps and who fell short of expectations? Here's our pick of winners and losers in the Hypercar class from the 24 Hours of Le Mans...
articles.content:
Records were broken at the 2024 Le Mans 24 Hours as nine cars finished on the lead lap.
That was partly circumstantial given safety cars intervened for more than a quarter of the race - including a … [+8698 chars]
